body.name: DeerValley Compact One Piece Toilet, Small Toilet for Bathroom with Comfort Wider Chair Seat, Modern Toilets Powerful Flush Tall Hight 12'' Rough-In Toilet White 23.6"D x 15.7"W x 26"H
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 47 mins
features: WIDER SEAT & SPACE SAVING: Our compact toilet measures 23.62 x 15.75 x 25.98 inches, perfect for smaller bathrooms. With a special wider seat design, it provides a more comfortable experience and is well-suited for taller individuals.

EFFICIENT SINGLE-FLUSH PERFORMANCE: The 1.28 GPF siphon jet flush utilizes the full tank with each flush to thoroughly clear waste. A fully-glazed 2-inch wide trapway drains completely without clogging while minimizing water usage.
EASY TO CLEAN: Our one-piece toilet features a seamless, full-skirt trap design that eliminates corners and grooves, making it incredibly easy to clean.

WHISPER-QUIET OPERATION: The soft-closing seat lowers gently, reducing noise for a comfortable experience without disturbing others. Its quick-release hinge allows simple removal for effortless cleaning.

EASY INSTALLATION: Our single flush toilet features two large side openings, facilitating straightforward installation. The package includes the toilet, soft-close lid, pre-installed flush valve, premium wax ring, floor bolts, installation instructions, and a 1/2-inch water supply line adapter.

12 MONTHS WARRANTY: We are committed to providing our customers with quality kitchen and bath products and a great shopping experience. If you are not satisfied with our products or encounter any problems, please feel free to email us through the platform and we will solve it for you in time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DeerValley Single Flush Small One Piece Toilet
Specifications Material: Ceramic Flush Type: Single Flush Bowl Shape:‎ Wider U Shape Dimensions: 23.62 x 15.75 x 25.98 inches Seat Height: 15.75''
Package Includes - 1 x One Piece Compact Toilet - 1 x Toilet Tank Lid - 1 x Soft-Close Toilet Seat - 1 x Wax Ring & Bolt Kit - 1 x Installation Instruction, etc.

Push Button Removable Seat Designed for this small toilet, our easy-release seat features three steps of operating - click, remove, and install, just where you need it, for drive away dirty, no matter when you want to change it. Wider Comfort Seat The 15.75-inch wider seat balances compact size with comfort of use. It's not too cramped for adult use.

Compact Design Super compact toilet, even better for small bathrooms. Soft Closing Seat Our toilet seat features soft-closing seat, reduces the noise of use, even at night, without disturbing the family's sleep. Water Saving Single Flush This single flush toilet with one touch but water conservation design, no need to worry how to choose where to put your fingers. Wide Adaptation Two size of supply line inlet hose are available for a wider range of adaptations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars remodeled another bathroom
reviews.reviewText: I like the small profile and simple design. I have used this exact toilet in two different bathrooms now because I like the look so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brilliant and powerful solution
reviews.reviewText: Brilliant solution. I was worried it would not flush powerfully enough with the tiny tank, but it is perfectly capable of handling all jobs. Although it perfectly fits my tiny 1920s bathroom, it does not feel like a child’s commode. Not chair height, but I was not looking for that. Taller humans are not complaining. No complaints after 3 weeks of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space saver that saved our bathroom
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wanted small oval toilet seat in a small space. I was not sure about 1-piece toilet but I am very happy with my decision. My bathroom is 6x6. Due to bathroom entrance is so close, this toilet bowel is perfect! Very compact tank but so powerful. No problem handling any poo poo!!! Amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clever design for an oval toilet to fit a small bathroom.
reviews.reviewText: I love the toilet. It solved a space problem but ...Two problems.The first is that a typical water supply valve exiting the wall will not fit between the toilet and the wall. I had very little space to try and move the toilet sideways enough and ended up with the valve only being accessible with some difficulty through the hatches in the sides of the toilet. The answer is to plan very carefully where you're installing the toilet and be prepared to relocate the valve if necessary before you're about to install the new one.The second one is the toilet seat. It fits well and does slowly and quietly lower itself. But it is really thin and flexible plastic. It bends too easily. It feels very flimsy. I would be very interested to learn of a strong wooden alternative seat that anyone has used to replace the OEM one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made our little bathroom bigger.
reviews.reviewText: Good unit. Looks great.Gave us 4" additional space between us and the tub face. Happy campers.I read various reviews of several small space toilets and chose to go with this one.We found our town offered a $100 credit for any toilet which did not exceed 1.28 gal per flush. Although the dual flush exceeds that, this single mode unit does not. We already received $100 off our utility bill this month. Yay.Anyway the install was straightforward. I did not have any issues with supply, (adapter now included), access to the closet bolts (from the rear) or alignment. I did mark the location of the bolt alignment on the floor with blue tape and marker due to the fact that you cannot readily see their location on this style of base.A word about umm efficiency. Some reviews of other small space, water saver,units dissed their purchases on their part Deux capabilities. This unit has a great topbowl swirl system and adequate suction. No problemo here. ok, nuff said Totally satisfactory in every regard. .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One piece toilet
reviews.reviewText: The design is nice. It does not have the duel flush button and size wise it is too low for my taste. If you have kids, perfect! For a typical adult it is too short. I wish I had paid attention to the measurements!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Customer service is #1 when it comes to number 2s
reviews.reviewText: I love the solid design of the toilet. Seemless and you don't see the molding where water flows. The toilet is not the easiest to install with close walls on either side but I honestly should have thought that through when I purchased the item. Only gave it 3 stars so others know of that one constraint. Customer service was responsive and great to work with when I accidentally broke a piece of the toilet while unpacking. Great product for anyone that needs to take a number 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have a summer camp with a very tiny bath area. I needed a small toilet. This worked out great. The bowl in of normal size. They appear to save space with the tank area. Single flush works well without any problems with a clog. Because it is a one piece tank and the weight, it basically takes 2 people to move and install the tank. I found it easier to shim the unit with a 2 x 4 piece of lumber and lower the toilet onto the flange. Would I buy this again? YES. Just have someone their to help.
